description: Ride hard, keep your promises, arrive on time, deliver the goods. Take care of your loved ones, never take from those that can't afford, never strike those who can't strike back. I'm six foot five, broad shoulders, short red hair. I don't yell at or strike those I love, I'm a quiet capable man. I love long, deep conversations, give me a night sky, a cold beer, good music and better conversation and that's the makings of an epic night. Who knows where that would end up.
